document_data.name: Kerlis
document_data.mainbody: '''Kerlis''' was one of the [[Blades of the Old Man]] in the fortress of [[Sentinelspire (fortress)|Sentinelspire]]. He was a part of the team accompanying [[Sauk]] to look for [[Kheil]] and secure the ''[[Erael'len]]'' in the Northern [[Shalhoond]], conspiring to kill the [[Chereth|Old Man of the Mountain]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||4}} He appeared to be afraid of spiders.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||8}} Kerlis was instrumental to [[Lewan]]'s capture, in order to assure Berun's compliance, but he received a number of painful{{cite book/Sentinelspire||6}} wounds in the process,{{cite book/Sentinelspire||7}} which affected his already low standing amongst his peers.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||9}} He was slain by Berun with an arrow to the eye then, on [[Tarsakh 16]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||12}}
